effect_entries.effect: Teaches X-Scissor to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches X-Scissor to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
カマや　ツメを　ハサミのように
交差させながら　相手を　切り裂く。

The user slashes at the target by
crossing its scythes or claws as if
they were a pair of scissors.

Chi la usa colpisce il nemico usando le sue falci
o i suoi artigli come se fossero delle forbici.

Quien lo usa se sumerge en el agua y ataca al
siguiente turno. También puede usarse para
bucear en el mar.

Der Anwender greift mit gekreuzten Scheren oder
Klauen an, als wären diese eine normale Schere.

Le lanceur taillade l’ennemi en utilisant ses faux
ou ses griffes comme une paire de ciseaux.

낫이나 발톱을 가위처럼
교차시키면서 상대를 베어 가른다.

カマや　ツメを　ハサミのように
こうさ　させながら　きりさいて
こうげきする。

The user slashes at the target by
crossing its scythes or claws as if
they were a pair of scissors.

crossing its scythes or claws as if

ses faux ou ses griffes comme une
paire de ciseaux.

The user slashes at the foe by
crossing its scythes or claws as if
they were a pair of scissors.
